description: Returns a list of host keys for the server that's specified by the ServerId parameter.

parameters.name: ServerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the server that contains the host keys that you want to view.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Returns a token that you can use to call ListHostKeys again and receive additional results, if there are any.

nested_items.name: ServerId
nested_items.description: Returns the server identifier that contains the listed host keys.

nested_items.name: HostKeys
nested_items.description: Returns an array, where each item contains the details of a host key.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the host key.

nested_items.name: HostKeyId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the host key.

nested_items.name: Fingerprint
nested_items.description: The public key fingerprint, which is a short sequence of bytes used to identify the longer public key.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The current description for the host key. You can change it by calling the UpdateHostKey operation and providing a new description.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The encryption algorithm that is used for the host key. The Type parameter is specified by using one of the following values:

nested_items.name: DateImported
nested_items.description: The date on which the host key was added to the server.
